scenario:
The report provides key information and data on the China Infusion Systems market, covering key market data on the China Infusion Systems market, including value (USD), volume (units) and average prices (USD) within market segments - Infusion Pumps and Infusion Pump Disposables. The report provides annualized market revenues (USD), volume (units) and average prices (USD) data for each of the market segments from 2018 to 2033. 

Key information includes 2023 company share and distribution share data for Infusion Systems Market, and global corporate-level profiles of key companies operating within the China Infusion Systems Market. The report is segmented into Infusion Pumps and Infusion Pump Disposables. 

The report will help investors develop business strategies by identifying key market segments poised for strong growth in the future, market-entry and market expansion strategies, design competition strategies, and develop investment strategies by identifying key market segments expected to register strong growth in the near future. 

Key companies covered in the report include Baxter International Inc., B. Braun Melsungen AG, Becton Dickinson and Co., and Fresenius Medical Care AG & Co. KGaA. The report also covers financial deals landscape, including a debt offering by MicroPort Scientific to raise USD220 million in public offering of 5.75% convertible bonds due 2028. 

The report is expected to be relevant to BDX (Becton Dickinson and Co.) as it provides key information and data on the China Infusion Systems market, including the company's share in the market and its global corporate-level profile.
